## Description {#details}

Wrapper class for IR location info (IR ordering and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a>) to be passed into <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> creation functions.

When an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> is created from the DAGBuilder, the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> is extracted from the original <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a>, and IROrder is the ordinal position of the instruction. When an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> is created after the DAG is being built, both <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugloc">DebugLoc</a> and the IROrder are propagated from the original <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a>. So <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> class provides two constructors besides the default one, one to be used by the DAGBuilder, the other to be used by others.

Definition at line 1182 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
